Name: Zac's Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist .
Review: Originally made for Zacapa rum which suits lemon rather than lime in a Daiquiri. Daiquiris benefit from dilution and here a dash of apple juice adds a barely perceptible amount of fruit as well.
History: Created in January 2009 by yours truly (Simon Difford) at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Zac's Daiquiri contains 203 calories
